meanings.definition: Follow or chase (someone or something) in order to catch or attack them.
meanings.sent1: The cat will pursue the mouse in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The police officer pursued the thief through the crowded streets.
meanings.sent3: The energetic puppy will pursue its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The detective pursued the truth like a bloodhound on a scent.
meanings.sent5: The determined athlete will pursue victory with unwavering focus.

meanings.definition: Seek to attain or accomplish (a goal).
meanings.sent1: She will pursue her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: He pursued a career in music after years of practice.
meanings.sent3: The student will pursue knowledge like a treasure hunter seeking gold.
meanings.sent4: The artist pursued perfection in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The explorer will pursue the hidden treasure with great determination.
